biotools.summary: R package specifically designed to genotype the Mouse Diversity Genotyping Array, an Affymetrix mouse genotyping array similar to the human SNP 6.0. It contains functions which allow you to perform genotyping, identify probe sets potentially harboring a new mutation (Variable INtensity Oligonucleotide or VINO, here we call it a vinotyping) and perform CNV analysis.

bioschemas.name: MouseDivGeno
bioschemas.summary: R package specifically designed to genotype the Mouse Diversity Genotyping Array, an Affymetrix mouse genotyping array similar to the human SNP 6.0. It contains functions which allow you to perform genotyping, identify probe sets potentially harboring a new mutation (Variable INtensity Oligonucleotide or VINO, here we call it a vinotyping) and perform CNV analysis.
